name: Lightning Draw
description: You can draw your weapon with startling speed.
prerequisites: Quick Draw, swashbuckler initiative deed, swashbuckler level 7th
benefit: You can spend 1 panache point to draw one or more light or one-handed piercing weapons, whether hidden or not, when you roll initiative, even at the start of a surprise round in which you canâ€™t act. Drawing these weapons does not take an action.
